price: Na lidhukuru jina la Mola wako Mlezi, na ujitolee kwake kwa ukamilifu.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا
footnotes: Na pitisha ulimini mwako kudhukuru jina la Mola aliye kuumba na kukulea, na mkhusishe Yeye tu kwa ibada kwa ukamilifu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
